Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: cold, dark room

As your eyes adjust to the surroundings, you note that this appears to be a small, one-room cabin. A door is set in the east wall, flanked by windows that have been partially boarded shut. A pot-bellied stove sets in the northwest corner with ramshackle, overly-cluttered shelves on either side. A rotting bedside table sets next to the bed against the south wall and is covered with various scrolls and parchments. Everything seems to be covered in a thick layer of cobwebs and dust. The most notable of possessions are the shovel and rake propped next to the door.

The room is cloaked in darkness with flashes of lightning outside giving only brief glimpses of your surroundings. Rain pounds harshly on the tin roof, drowned out only by the occasional roar of wind. The cold, damp air invades your lungs, making it difficult to breathe.

You occasionally get a glimpse of your surroundings: a cluttered living area infested with cobwebs, dirt, and grime. Personal belongings are scattered over sparse furniture, the most notable being the farming tools propped next to the door.

old iron bed
You find yourself pinned to the middle of an old iron bed. The threadbare sheets are stained and crawling with bugs.
the wooden door
The wooden door set in the east wall.
dark figure
An imposing dark figure with malevolent red eyes and shapeless body. It has no other discernible features.
dusty floor
The floor is covered in a thick layer of dust and damaged beyond repair.
set of ramshackle, overly-cluttered shelves

Two sets of crudely-built shelves set on either side of the stove. Some of the shelves have given way to the weight of the clutter: dust-covered jars, books, other unidentifiable objects crammed wherever they might fit.
pot-bellied stove
A typical pot-bellied stove. It does not appear to have been used in quite some time.
rotting bedside table

An ordinary table that has probably seen better days. Cobwebs have claimed the underside while scrolls and parchment are piled on top. $[if(Int($actor."skill:mental:observation") > 10) return "You manage to catch writing on one of the scrolls: 'To my Henry with love...'";]
farming tools
A shovel and rake propped next to the door covered with wispy cobwebs.
the boarded up windows
The windows have been partially boarded up, allowing some light to filter through.
